member.name: T:PNEncryption.PNEncryptor
member.summary: Represents class for simple encryption/decription operations

member.name: M:PNEncryption.PNEncryptor.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes new instance of PNEncryptor class
member.param: String used as initial token for encryption/decryption

member.name: M:PNEncryption.PNEncryptor.DecryptStringWithTrim(System.String)
member.summary: Decrypts string if it is not empty or null
member.returns: Decrypted string or empty string in case the source is empty string or null

member.name: M:PNEncryption.PNEncryptor.EncryptStringWithTrim(System.String)
member.summary: Encrypts string if it is not empty or null
member.returns: Encrypted string or empty string in case the source is empty string or null

member.name: M:PNEncryption.PNEncryptor.GetHashString(System.String)
member.summary: Returns hash string for input string
